functions.name: init
functions.description: Setup the conversion helper and declare the location of ConversionHelper.jsm

parameters.name: aPath
parameters.description: Either the chrome:// path to the JSM or the relative location of ConversionHelper.jsm from the root of the extension (in case of pure WX). If a JSM is loaded via relative path, it cannot be loaded via chrome path in other parts of the addon!

functions.name: notifyStartupCompleted
functions.description: Notify legacy code that startup of WebExtension has finished.
